org.jcvi.jillion.internal.fasta

Class AbstractResuseableFastaRecordVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.internal.fasta.AbstractResuseableFastaRecordVisitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FastaRecordVisitor

    public abstract class AbstractResuseableFastaRecordVisitor
extends Object
implements FastaRecordVisitor
    AbstractResuseableFastaRecordVisitor is a FastaRecordVisitor that gathers consecutive calls to visitBodyLine(String) to compile the entire body of a fasta record. This class can be reused by resetting the current id and comment using prepareNewRecord(String, String) so we don't create new instances for each fasta record to be visited.
    Author:
    dkatzel
